text: Ate jadom' saitana ne unham nu unham de karama manamauhaka bana ke dikha'e ate kiha ki lokam vicom aja ko'i tuhanu mata dena vala nahim ate maim tuhade nala ham. Paratu jadom dovom phaujam ika duje te sahamane ho'i'am tam unham na puthe pairim bhajana pi'a ate kiha ki maim tuhade vicom bari ham. Maim uha kujha dekha riha ham jihara tusim loka nahim dekhade maim alaha tom darada ham ate alaha kathora saza dena vala hai
